example.eg: The cat was curled up by the fire, looking content.
example.egtrans: 那只猫咪在炉火旁蜷成一团，看起来很满足。

dsense.name: content to do [sth], content with doing [sth]

example.eg: She was content to hear about his promotion.
example.egtrans: 听说他升了职，她很满足。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 满足于…的，对做…感到心满意足的

example.eg: The content of the essay is interesting and important.
example.egtrans: 这篇文章的内容很有趣，也很重要。

example.eg: The article was well structured, but it didn't have much content.
example.egtrans: 文章结构不错，但没有多少实质内容。

example.eg: Vera emptied the contents of her handbag onto the table.
example.egtrans: 薇拉把手提包里的东西全部倒在桌子上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 包含的东西, 容纳的东西

example.eg: The contents are at the front of the book.
Jeff's job is to make sure the content of the website is always up to date.
example.egtrans: 杰夫的工作就是确保网络信息总是实时更新的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 网络信息, 电子信息

example.eg: His content with his children's success was obvious.
example.egtrans: 他对孩子成就的满足感很明显。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 满足, 满意, 心满意足

example.eg: I'm too old to party on a Friday night; these days I content myself with a cup of tea and a few episodes of my favourite TV show.
Jane had to content herself with redecorating her kitchen as she couldn't afford to have a new one fitted.
example.egtrans: 简只能选择重新布置厨房，因为她无法负担新装厨房的费用。

dsense.name: to your heart's content
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (as much as you please) (比喻，非正式用语)

example.eg: You can ask me to your heart's content, but I won't answer your questions.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 按照你的心意，如你所愿
